releaseNotes: Auto-update notification system with version verification. Enhanced update management with improved notification UI.
changelog: Added automatic update check notification system
Implemented version comparison between local and remote versions
Enhanced update details window with beautiful UI
Added support for critical update notifications
Improved update download with GitHub releases support
Added manual update check from settings menu
Enhanced error handling and user feedback
Enhanced browser security with Chrome 120 emulation
Added privacy controls for clearing cookies, cache, and history
Fixed quick links authentication with shared session
